meanings.definition: The combination of circumstances at a given time.
meanings.sent1: In that situation, everything seemed confusing.
meanings.sent2: The situation at the party was lively and fun.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle all those tasks was quite a situation!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, brightening the situation.
meanings.sent5: The tense situation made everyone hold their breath.

meanings.sent1: He found himself in a difficult situation at work.
meanings.sent2: The situation of the house on the hill provided a stunning view.
meanings.sent3: Balancing on one foot, he realized his situation was precarious.
meanings.sent4: She stood tall, owning her situation with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The situation of the shipwreck on the shore was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A set of circumstances or state of affairs.
meanings.sent1: The situation with the weather made the picnic challenging.
meanings.sent2: The political situation in the country was tense.
meanings.sent3: His situation of forgetting his keys again was comical.
meanings.sent4: The situation of love can be both beautiful and complicated.
meanings.sent5: The dire situation called for immediate action.
